Sentencas: This paper is focused on the synthesis of ceria-doped Ni-ZrO2 nanocrystals (Ni-CZ) via a novel synthetic strategy based on wet impregnation and its application as anode material for solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) directly fuelled by biogas.
Titulo: Ni-Ce-ZrO2 system as anode material for direct internal reforming biogas solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The electrochemical behaviour of Ni-CZ was evaluated by means of IV curves and impedance spectroscopy in H2 and simulated biogas at 750-850 ?
Titulo: Ni-Ce-ZrO2 system as anode material for direct internal reforming biogas solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: using yttria stabilized zirconia (YSZ) electrolyte-supported cell.
Titulo: Ni-Ce-ZrO2 system as anode material for direct internal reforming biogas solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The cell achieved higher power density in H-2 and at higher temperature.
Titulo: Ni-Ce-ZrO2 system as anode material for direct internal reforming biogas solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The distribution of relaxation time (DRT) analysis of impedance data was carried to determine the contribution of electrodes processes.
Titulo: Ni-Ce-ZrO2 system as anode material for direct internal reforming biogas solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Detailed of electrochemical analysis revealed that the cell performance limiting factor corresponds to the electrodes processes at low frequencies which are related to gas diffusion in H2 and dry reforming process and water gas shit reaction coupled to gas diffusion in biogas.
Titulo: Ni-Ce-ZrO2 system as anode material for direct internal reforming biogas solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The cell showed a stable performance or even better activation in biogas under aggressive operation condition (400 mV) that could favour its degradation at 750 ? and 800 C for 20 h and at 850 C for 200 h.
Titulo: Ni-Ce-ZrO2 system as anode material for direct internal reforming biogas solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Furthermore post-tests analysis detected negligible carbon deposition on the anode surface.
Titulo: Ni-Ce-ZrO2 system as anode material for direct internal reforming biogas solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Although Ni-CZ could be postulated as SOFC anode material for direct biogas due to its good stability, an improvement its electrochemical perform is required.
Titulo: Ni-Ce-ZrO2 system as anode material for direct internal reforming biogas solid oxide fuel cells
